profession: Systems Engineering Student | Interest in Data Science & AI
heroDescription: Seeking pre-professional internship opportunities and first junior job in software development, data analysis, and data science.
profileText1: 8th semester Systems and Computing Engineering student with a web development foundation and a growing focus on Data Science and Artificial Intelligence. I compensate for the lack of formal work experience through academic and personal projects that demonstrate technical ability and fast learning.
profileText2: I have knowledge in software development (backend/frontend), SQL databases, and I am currently actively training in Python, data analysis, and machine learning. I seek a professional environment where I can contribute and continue growing.
focus: Focus on software development, data & AI
